name: Lucy Rose
info:
• 别名: Lucy Rose Parton
  • 别名: ルーシー・ローズ
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1989年6月28日
detail: Lucy Rose Parton, known as Lucy Rose (born 28 June 1989) is an English singer-songwriter from Warwickshire, England.[1] Her debut album, Like I Used To was released in September 2012. Lucy Rose released her second album Work It Out on 6 July 2015 on Columbia Records.[2]
